channel.title: Making client smaller
channel.description: how can i slim down my cilent. i wanna remove the cursors and the mp3 player. and screenshots. but when i remove it from the gui it doesnt let me compile so any suggestions on how to remove everything? im pretty sure i have a bluurr client.
